page.title: 18GALA WEEK
page.content: Each year towards the end of June we have Gala Week. Events are organised by the Gala Committee throughout the year to raise funds to cover the cost of prizes and the events of Gala Week. The Primary school is closely involved choosing the Gala Queen and her attendants and entering the various competitions. Local shops enter into the spirit by presenting appropriate window displays from which the youngest pupils select a winner. Gala Day at Victoria Park brings the week to a climax with the crowning of the Queen who then presides over a variety of events. This year,however,the inclement weather forced events indoors at the Town Hall.
